events.title: Corey Kent - The Black Bandana Tour
events.location: North Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, United States Of America
events.description: Doors - 6:30pm Show - 8:00pm Confirmed Line Up: Corey Kent & Max McNown All support acts are subject to change without notice. This is an All Ages event subject to parental discretion. THE FOLLOWING BAG POLICY IS IN PLACE: Bags up to 12" x 6" x 12" are allowed in the venue. No large bags or backpacks! All bags will be searched prior to entry. Bags that are not clear will be subject to additional search. Buy early and save! Ticket prices will increase. All tickets are subject to applicable service fees via all points of sale There is a strict 8 ticket limit for this event. Accounts found in violation of the posted ticket limit may be cancelled without notice.

events.title: Corey Kent - The Black Bandana Tour
events.location: Atlanta, Georgia, United States Of America
events.description: Main floor is general admission standing. Balcony is reserved seating. GA floor has a pit area with limited capacity. GA ticketholders who arrive after the pit is full will be directed to other open areas on the floor. All ages welcome. Doors at 6:30 PM. Show at 8 PM.

events.title: Corey Kent - The Black Bandana Tour (18+)
events.location: Boston, Massachusetts, United States Of America
events.description: 18+ w/ a valid ID Door Time: 7:00pm Show Time: 8:00m

events.title: Corey Kent: The Black Bandana Tour
events.location: New York, New York, United States Of America
events.description: Accessible accommodations should purchase a General Admission ticket and will be taken care of at the venue day of event.

events.title: Michael Marcagi
events.description: This event is an all General Admission event. Patrons requesting accessible seating should purchase a General Admission ticket and reach out to the Venue at 306-651-1000 in advance for accommodation.

events.title: The 502s - Great American Road Trip with Special Guest Max McNown
events.location: Mc Kees Rocks, Pennsylvania, United States Of America
events.description: DOORS: 7:00 PM SHOW: 8:00 PM ALL AGES SHOW Delivery is delayed for this event, tickets will be released 72 hours prior to the show.
